title: Bent's Old Fort National Historic Site: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       Â    The park provides a number of opportunities for photographers and artists.  The historically accurate fort with all its furnished rooms provide a wonderful backdrop for photos of living history interpreters during special events.  The livestock and flora and fauna relative to the riparian and short grass prairie are sometimes available for those who have a discerning eye.  See the photo gallery and virtual tour for ideas for your visit.
